intro: Astronia gitingensis, commonly known as the Gitingen starling tree, is a tropical tree native to the Philippines. It belongs to the family Anacardiaceae, which includes cashew and mango. The plant is characterized by its compound leaves and small, yellowish flowers that appear in clusters. It produces small, round fruits that are typically eaten by birds and other animals. Due to habitat loss, it is considered a vulnerable species in its native range.
